attribute_identification:
```yaml
Load Raw Data:
    Inputs:
        - data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/customer_data.csv"
    Outputs:
        - processed_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/customer_data_processed.parquet"

Feature Selection:
    Inputs:
        - processed_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/customer_data_processed.parquet"
        - feature_list: ["age", "income", "credit_score", "price_per_unit"]
    Outputs:
        - selected_features_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/customer_data_processed.parquet"

Train-Test Split:
    Inputs:
        - selected_features_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/customer_data_processed.parquet"
        - test_size: 0.2
        - random_state: 42
    Outputs:
        - train_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/train_data.parquet"
        - test_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/test_data.parquet"

Normalize Data:
    Inputs:
        - train_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/train_data.parquet"
        - feature_list: ["age", "income", "credit_score", "price_per_unit"]
    Outputs:
        - normalized_train_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/normalized_train_data.parquet"
        - scaler_path: "/home/user/models/scaler.pkl"

Train Model:
    Inputs:
        - normalized_train_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/normalized_train_data.parquet"
        - feature_list: ["age", "income", "credit_score", "price_per_unit"]
        - model_params: {"n_estimators": 100, "random_state": 42}
    Outputs:
        - model_path: "/home/user/models/random_forest.pkl"

Model Evaluation:
    Inputs:
        - model_path: "/home/user/models/random_forest.pkl"
        - scaler_path: "/home/user/models/scaler.pkl"
        - test_data_path: "gs://my-bucket/data/processed/test_data.parquet"
        - feature_list: ["age", "income", "credit_score", "price_per_unit"]
    Outputs:
        - evaluation_results_path: "/home/user/models/eval_results.txt"
```
